Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    Connection establishes a secured TCP connection from a user local to a given remote machine and maintains a pair of ObjectInput and ObjectOutput Streams with that remote machine.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.io.ObjectInputStream in 
      java.io.ObjectOutputStream out 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Connection()
      This is a constructor execute at a remote machine to receive a connection from a user-local machine.
      Connection(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String hostname, java.lang.String command)
      This is a contructor executed at a user-local machine to set up a connection to each of remote machines.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      close() is called at a user-local machine to close the ssh connection with a given remote machine.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • in

        public java.io.ObjectInputStream in

      • out

        public java.io.ObjectOutputStream out

    • Constructor Detail

      • Connection

        public Connection(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  java.lang.String hostname,
                  java.lang.String command)
        This is a contructor executed at a user-local machine to set up a connection to each of remote machines.
        Parameters:
        username - your user account name
        password - the password corresponding to username
        hostname - the name of a remote host computer to connect to
        command - the remote java program to execute

      • Connection

        public Connection()
        This is a constructor execute at a remote machine to receive a connection from a user-local machine.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        close() is called at a user-local machine to close the ssh connection with a given remote machine.
